questions.quote: Ah, listen, George, what else can I do with these guys? Now, bear in mind, they're a little light on the yen.
No, no.  Kramer, you don't understand. He made the last contact between us. I had the upper hand in the post-breakup relationship. If he thinks that I said hi, then I lose the upper hand.
Well, then the waitress, she comes up and she tells me to shut up or they're gonna throw me out.
Listen I was talking to Elaine today and she said she'd would really like to be an usher at the wedding
Yeah, why don't you guys get a table so you'll have good seats?
Elaine? It's me, George.  Hey, sorry to bother you so late.  Hey! How ya doin.'  Uh, did you get any of those sponges?
I took two bites, how am I finished?  Plus you're coming down with something? You want me to get sick?  Bite?
Well, isn't an architect just an art school drop-out with a tilty desk, and a big ruler?
"Hey! Hey! listen ... Do one of you guys know that ..that blond guy who's always on the exercycle at the health club. You know he's just really handsome?.."
... Uh, go ahead, yeah.  Alright uh... Yeah, yeah, okay... I look forward to it too.  Eh, hah, okay. So long.
